item.description:
I'll be competing in this karaoke contest, which includes the winners of twice a week contests since January.

There could be more than 30 contestants, if they all can make it.

The contest starts at 5 PM.

There will be 2 rounds, so each contestant gets to sing 2 songs, 1 in each round.

The order that the contestants will sing in will be determined by a random draw, conducted just before the contest begins.

If you can't make it for the early part of the contest, consider coming later.

This should go on all evening long, and there will probably be regular karaoke if the contest ends before the bar closes.

There is no cover charge.

This is the third year that they have conducted this contest, and I have posted it for meetup all 3 years.

The winner of this contest will compete in a contest in Reno.

I am posting this event to several meetup groups.

DJ Donny posted this contest as a facebook event:

http://www.facebook.com/events/287825324633183/

The place should be packed, so I would appreciate anybody who can arrive at 4:30 to help me save seats.

Â
item.how_to_find_us: Look for My Meetup Sign and ask for Neil.
item.name: Karaoke Contest Finals
